Tema leta 2020 - Džejdon Sančo: Real, Junajted, ili Gvardiola ima buy-back kao keca u rukavu?
Ozbiljno se zakuvalo oko najskupljeg mladog igrača Evrope...

05 Nov 2019

Ozbiljno se zakuvalo oko Džejdona Sanča (19), jednog najtraženijih mladih igrača Evrope! Englezi su prethodnih dana pisali kako Mančester Junajted na leto planira snažan napad na novopečenog reprezentativca Albiona, međutim prema najnovijim informacijama sa Ostrva šanse Đavola su svakim danom sve manje. Pored toga što Junajtedu nikako ne ide ove sezone i što će najverovatnije ponovo ostati bez Lige šampiona - a dobro je poznato kakvu će to odbojnost stvoriti za najbolje igrače - Dejli mejl javlja da se u priču ponovo uključuje Real Madrid. 
Podsetimo, Madriđani su imali na oku mladog Engleza još dok je 2017. odlazio iz Mančester Sitija u Dortmund, međutim tada je procenjeno da je Dani Sebaljos prioritet i novac je uložen u najboljeg igrača EP za mlade.
Kraljevski klub je ovog leta već izdvojio ogroman novac za renoviranje ekipe, ali Florentino Perez je javnosti jasno stavio do znanja da je to bio tek početak. Primarna meta Reala ostaje Kilijan Mbape, s tim što nije isključeno da će na njega Kraljevići morati još malo da popričekaju, što bi otvorilo mogućnost da se svim snagama "udari" na Dortmund.
Dovođenje Džejdona Sanča velika je operacija i zahtevala bi ozbiljno pražnjenje klupske kase, zbog čega je gotovo nemoguće zamisliti da bi u istom prelaznom roku mogao da stigne i Mbape. Ne tako davno CIES je Engleza proglasio za najvrednijeg mladog igrača sveta (150.600.000 evra), a to daje određeni legitimitet njegovoj realnoj vrednosti, koja, po proceni ljudi sa Vestfalena, trenutno iznosi oko 115.000.000 evra. Ispod te cifre Nemci se ne bi odrekli Sanča. 
A da se pripremaju na takav scenario - pripremaju se. Borusija je već nagomilala igrače na krilnim pozicijama, prošlog leta dovela je Julijana Branta i Torgana Azara, tu je i Marko Rojs, Jakub Brun Larsen neće još dugo biti strpljiv i čekati s klupe... Na sve to, skauting Milionera neumorno radi i traga za novim biserima. Naposletku, Borusija i funkcioniše tako što prodaje svoje najvrednije i najbolje produkte, a Sančo to svakako jeste.



I dok se mnogi klubovi utrkuju za što bolju poziciju pred start pregovora sa Dortmundom, Mančester Siti mudro ćuti i čeka svojih pet minuta. Građani i te kako imaju svoj interes, pogotovo ukoliko se ispostavi da imaju buy-back klauzulu. Protiv Sitija se dugo vodio postupak pred nadležnim organima FA vezanim za transfer Džejdona Sanča iz Votforda 2015. godine. Klub je optužen da je nelegalno došao do igrača koji u tom trenutku nije imao 16 godina, ali pošto za tako nešto nisu pronađeni dokazi Mančester Siti nije proglašen krivim. Samim tim, ukoliko je zaista ima, pomenuta klauzula ostaje na snazi. A ona podrazumeva da Pep Gvardiola mora da bude obavešten kada Borusija Dortmund prihvati bilo koju ponudu za Sanča.
To faktički znači da bi Mančester Siti mogao da izjednači svaku ponudu i tako vrati mladog asa u svoje redove. Naravno, sve pod uslovom da Džejdon Sančo pristane na uslove koje mu Građani ponude.
Kada su u pitanju želje igrača on se za sada ne izjašnjava. Priče o transferu podgreva njegovo sve češće sedenje na klupi, odnosno nedisciplina zbog koje je pre nekoliko nedelja kažnjen sa 100.000 evra i izbačen na kratko iz tima.
Sančo je ove sezone odigrao osam utakmica u Bundesligi, postigao je tri i namestio šest golova. Prošle godine imao je učinak od 12 pogodaka i 17 asistencija. 
Da se ne čudite otkud toliko interesovanje za momka...

2020 Summer Theme - Jaydon Sancho: Real, United, or Guardiola has a buy-back like an ace up his sleeve?
There is serious concern about Europe's most expensive young player ...

05 Nov 2019

There is serious mischief about Jadon Sanche, 19, one of Europe's most wanted young players! The English have written in previous days that Manchester United are planning a strong attack on the newly-minted Albion in the summer, but according to the latest information from the Isle, the chances of the Devil are diminishing every day. In addition to the fact that United are not going this season and are likely to lose the Champions League again - and it is well known what aversion this will create for the best players - the Daily Mail reports that Real Madrid is back in the story.
Recall that Madrid had the eye of a young Englishman as he departed Manchester City in Dortmund in 2017, however, at the time, Dani Sebaljos was considered a priority and money was put into the best player of the EP for young people.
The Royal Club has already earmarked a huge amount of money this summer to renovate the squad, but Florentino Perez has made it clear to the public that this was just the beginning. The primary target for Real remains Kilian Mbape, but it is not excluded that the Kings will have to wait a little longer, which would open the possibility of all forces to "strike" at Dortmund.
Bringing in Jaydon Sanche is a major operation and would require a serious drain on the club ticket, making it almost impossible to imagine that Mbape could arrive in the same transition period. Not too long ago, CIES declared the Englishman to be the most valuable young player in the world (150.6 million euros), which gives some legitimacy to his real value, which, according to people from Westphalia, is currently around 115 million euros. Below that figure, the Germans would not give up Sancho.
And to prepare for such a scenario - they are preparing. Borussia has already accumulated players in the wing positions, last summer brought in Julian Brant and Torgan Azar, there is also Marko Royce, Jakub Brun Larsen will not be patient for a long time and wait off the bench ... for new pearls. After all, Borussia works by selling its most valuable and best products, and Sancho certainly is.



While many clubs are racing for the best possible position before the start of negotiations with Dortmund, Manchester City is silent and waits for its five minutes. Citizens also have their own interest, especially if it turns out they have a buy-back clause. City has long been subject to proceedings before the competent authorities of the FA in connection with the transfer of Jayden Sanch from Watford in 2015. The club was accused of illegally arriving at a player who was not 16 at the time, but as no such evidence was found, Manchester City was found not guilty. Therefore, if any, the said clause remains in force. And she implies that Pep Guardiola must be notified when Borussia Dortmund accepts any offer for Sancha.
In fact, this means that Manchester City could even out any bid and thus bring the young ace back into their ranks. Of course, all on condition that Jason Sancho agrees to the terms that the Citizens offer him.
When it comes to player preferences, he has not yet stated himself. The transfer story is fueled by his frequent sitting on the bench, that is, the indiscipline of which he was fined a few weeks ago with € 100,000 and expelled briefly from the team.
Sancho has played eight games in the Bundesliga this season, scoring three and setting six goals. Last year, he had an impact of 12 hits and 17 assists.
Don't be surprised how much interest you have in the guy ...
